query:
INSERT INTO balance_transactions (
  customerId, 
  amount, 
  type, 
  origin, 
  description, 
  balanceBefore, 
  balanceAfter, 
  createdAt
)
SELECT 
  480001,
  120,
  'credit',
  'system',
  CONCAT('Recarga via PIX - ', p.txid),
  c.balance - 120,
  c.balance,
  NOW()
FROM customers c
CROSS JOIN pix_transactions p
WHERE c.id = 480001 
  AND p.customerId = 480001 
  AND p.amount = 120
ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1
